project_abstract.cdata: The project comprises: (a) the development of three breeding/fattening ranches by rehabilitating and expanding two existing ranches and a maize farm. The main developments would include: land clearing, fencing, watering facilities, improved pastures and the purchase of breeding cattle; (b) the improvement of some 50 privately-owned herds, ranging from 10 to 400 head each in the areas surrounding the ranches. The owners would be provided with technical advice and finance for improved breeding stock, and where necessary for spray races, fencing materials, land clearing and pasture improvement; (c) the overseas training of Ghanaian ranch managers; (d) the identification of further ranch sites and the preparation of a second stage project.
